name: Darkness (Und3rC0ver)
description:
Hi guys,

This is my first released game for my first game jam ;)

Maybe it's not scary and maybe it's not the best (and not the longest), but I was having fun and I learned a lot about game dev. So I'm really proud of this game :D

I appreciate if you give me some feedback about this game

Hope you enjoy it ;)

Made for Fear Jam 2

I used:

Platforms form Oubliette Tileset made by safwyl

Sounds from Mixkit and Soundbible

Music from main menu by z3r0 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD2iUVkyqfuAFvqpdWweTkw)

Font made by Chinafreak
